title: Structure permissions for Emprez Web Service
content: If you have more than one Enterprise under the same customer number, make sure that:The Enterprise Code in Emprez and in your web service is the same,The Enterprise is authorized to transmit data in EmprezThe Enterprise Code in Emprez and in your web service is the sameThis code is made up of 7 alphanumeric characters from your web service. This is the code that is displayed on the front of every employee web company. The company is authorized to transmit data in EmprezMake sure that the Emprez service user is authorized to access all of your companies.To check in your web service:  Go to Administration / User profile / Access to companies,Choose the service user for Emprez from the list,Check everything in the next page,Save.If you are unable to complete the steps in this section, please contact your payroll service.Helpful?00Updated: 2 years ago Share :
